item.title: Logs and metrics for Small Data
item.description: This post is a personal comment. I'm going to talk about how using some tools thought for “Big Data"â„¢ makes sense for common development tasks. If you hear someone talking about ELK, Grafana or Prometheus, you wouldn't think about a system to run your laptop during development, right? Logs Concatenating files, parsing logs, are some of those tasks that are part of our daily routine as developers. We type lots of commands (usually connected via pipes |) to accomplish a given goal.
